data.title: Pierce Brosnan shares family photo from son's graduation
data.meta_description: Pierce Brosnan and his wife Keely Shaye Brosnan recently celebrated their son Paris' graduation.
data.text:
Pierce Brosnan and his wife Keely Shaye Brosnan are celebrating a major milestone for their son Paris.

The proud parents shared snaps over the weekend from their 22-year-old son's graduation from Loyola Marymount University's School of Film & Television in Los Angeles, California.

"Dearest Paris, Heartfelt congratulations on your graduation from Loyola Marymount University School of Film & Television," the actor wrote in his Instagram post, which featured photos of their family.

"Go into the world with a brave heart and create stories that will make the world a better place," he added.

In Keely Shaye Brosnan's post for her son, she wrote, "We are beyond proud of you and the incredible passion and talent you possess. Go forth and do good things. A man becomes what he dreamsâ€¦ dream well."

She also directed her followers to watch her son's short-film for Clarins x FEED, released in 2021.

Pierce Brosnan also congratulated Paris on his recent art exhibition in Los Angeles, in a May 5 Instagram post.

Pierce Brosnan and Keely Shaye Brosnan are also parents to son, Dylan, 26, who was not pictured in the graduation photos.

Pierce Brosnan has two other sons, Sean Brosnan, 39, and Christopher Brosnan, 50, whom he shared with his late wife Cassandra Harris, who died of ovarian cancer in 1991. He adopted Christopher, along with Harris' daughter Charlotte Brosnan, after their father died in 1986.

Charlotte Brosnan died of ovarian cancer in 2013.
